'''2.1.13508''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]] and [[MCD:Launcher|Dungeons]]), '''2.1.13509''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]), or '''2.1.13507''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] that was released on March 31, 2020.<ref>https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCL-13597</ref>

== Changes ==
* Updated icons in sidebar for games.
* Added pre-order link for ''[[Minecraft Dungeons]]''.
